'''Briffo Boffin''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]].

==History==
Briffo was the third child of [[Buffo Boffin]] and [[Ivy Goodenough]]. In {{SR|1210}}, he moved to [[Bree]].<ref>{{App|Boffin}}</ref>
